ad_text: Welton Motor Freight Sponsored ALL NEW POSTIONS AVAILABLE NOW. A new position has opened with Welton Motor Freight. This is a Hybrid Regional/Local position. Weeks will vary with work load. Welton is looking for dedicated individuals who want to make a switch to a company who respects your time and is able to accommodate work schedules. Some trips are mileage, some are hourly, both come with a guaranteed minimum for a full week. Earn top pay all while having the best home time in the business. Drivers applying need 2 years verifiable experience, a positive driving record, flatbed experience preferred but not required, a great attitude and a willing to learn. Onsite training available. Full benefits packages available. Come work where the pros work. Come see why our retention rate is one of the highest in the business. 2 POSITIONS AVAIBLE Click here to apply https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/1813525 FULL-TIME · $62,400 - $93,600 / YEAR · CHESTER, VIRGINIA Class A CDL Flatbed Truck Driver Apply now
